attributes.action: Restict the speed and lane use of HGV's on motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We all get frustrated by HGV's causing rolling roadblocks when they try and overtake each other on the motorway.

Government should restrict the speed of HGV's to 50 mph and restrict them to the inside lane at all times.

This would reduce frustration for the vast majority of drivers, free up space on the motorway and therefore reduce congestion and hopefully will start to move freight to railways.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
